channel.title: egrep on What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content in egrep on What, Why, How

item.title: Grep
item.description: Getting started Usage Search standard output (i.e. a stream of text) 1 $ grep [options] search_string Search for an exact string in file: 1 $ grep [options] search_string path/to/file Print lines in myfile.txt containing the string “mellon” 1 $ grep 'mellon' myfile.txt Wildcards are accepted in filename. Option examples Option Example Operation -i grep -i ^DA demo.
